title: Organic Type shirt
content:
I just wanted to post this shirt I designed. It’s set in Gotham and treated to look like cotton cotton plants. It’s printed on 100% organic cotton from American Apparel’s Sustainable Edition.

I wanted to create a shirt with a clean, simple design and use it support sustainable cotton farms.

[Organic Tee for sale](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019093755/http:/www.turnnocturnal.com/product/organic)  
 [
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019093755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/emptees_2_3800.jpg)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019093755/http:/www.turnnocturnal.com/product/organic)

author: mattmc

comments.content: you’ve got some nice shirts on your site man. Sorta broke at the moment but I may buy some in the near future.
